metadata.title: Lakshmi Fragrance 1/3 Ounce Roll On by The Goddess Line
features: Amber, Frankincense, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Sweet Almond Oil.
Recommended As A Unisex Scent - Musky
Does Not Use Animal Based Musk - No Animal Cruelty.
1/3 Ounce Glass Rollerball Bottle. Perfect For Travel. Makes A Great Gift.
Hand Made In The USA. Vegan. Cruelty Free. Contains No Alcohol or Water.
description: This is recommended as a UNISEX scent!! Notes of "musk", patchouli, sandalwood, frankincense and amber, mixed with sweet almond oil. (This DOES NOT use real musk and there are no animals products used). Lakshmi gets its 'musky' scent from a blend of oils, such as patchouli, amber, frankincense, etc. Amber is known to be comforting and supporting. Frankincense is thought of to be calming, comforting and uplifting. Patchouli is also known to be uplifting and calming. Sandalwood helps people remember good times and enhance the ones sense of wellness. 1/3 Ounce Glass Rollerball Bottle - Great For Travel. Hand Made In NYC. Contains No Alcohol or Water. Vegan - Not Tested On Animals.
